original_text: But when Sanballat and Tobiah and the Arabs and the Ammonites and the Ashdodites heard that the repairing of the walls of Jerusalem was going forward and that the breaches were beginning to be closed, they were very angry.
korean_text: 산발랏과 도비야와 아라비아 사람들과 암몬 사람들과 아스돗 사람들이 예루살렘 성이 중수되어 그 허물어진 틈이 메꾸어져 간다 함을 듣고 심히 분노하여

sentences.original_text: But when Sanballat and Tobiah and the Arabs and the Ammonites and the Ashdodites heard
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 산발랏과 도비야와 아라비아 사람들과 암몬 사람들과 아스돗 사람들이 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: that the repairing of the walls of Jerusalem was going forward
sentences.korean_translation: 예루살렘 성벽 수리가 진행되고 있다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and that the breaches were beginning to be closed
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 성벽의 틈들이 메워지기 시작했다는 것을
